title: SOOOOOOO THAM KENCH CAN FUCK ME ANYWHERE I GO IN TOP LANE

replies.body: I don't even remember the last time I saw a Tahm top...
I mean he was designed with the intent to go top and support. They gutted his support playstyle so all that's left is top
Literally half the people I play against yell at me saying he was not designed to be a top laner at all, its like they are new to the game or something...
Tahm is overwhelmingly broken vs melee champs in the top lane, so I understand your frustration.
Hail of blades TK is...infuriating to say the least if you are melee.
